description.raw: To enable graphical inertia modification in gazebo (see [design document](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_design/src/b2d3fd8746867/inertia_resize/inertia_resize.md) and [design document pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_design/pull-requests/28/move-physics-inertial-to-ignition-math-add/diff)) the [gazebo::physics::Inertial](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/f69b82f6e25ce51bac/gazebo/physics/Inertial.hh) is being ported to ignition math. The first step in that process is creating a new sub-class called `MassMatrix3` that contains the scalar mass and the symmetric moment of inertia matrix components. A follow-up pull request will provide functionality for diagonalizing an inertia matrix to identify the principal moments of inertia and orientation of the principal axes. For now, the new class is added with accessors,modifiers and basic operators.
description.html: To enable graphical inertia modification in gazebo (see design document and design document pull request) the gazebo::physics::Inertial is being ported to ignition math. The first step in that process is creating a new sub-class called MassMatrix3 that contains the scalar mass and the symmetric moment of inertia matrix components. A follow-up pull request will provide functionality for diagonalizing an inertia matrix to identify the principal moments of inertia and orientation of the principal axes. For now, the new class is added with accessors,modifiers and basic operators.

title.raw: First part of MassMatrix3 class, mostly accessors and modifiers
